| 'This is a list of released and upcoming [[video game]]s under
| [[Microsoft]]'s [[Games for Windows]] label. The "LIVE" column indicates
| titles compatible with [[Games for Windows â Live|Games for Windows â LIVE]],
| which include online gaming features and achievements. Titles that are
| currently in production and expected to be released are marked as such.'
When a game is released, it should be moved to the appropriate section. This
list should not contain vaporware.
